description: Provide seamless integration with Smartling translation services to manage projects, files, jobs, and translation strings efficiently. Enhance your localization workflows with AI-powered insights, cost optimization, and auto-debugging features. Enable reliable and secure translation management directly from your MCP-compatible applications.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for AI-powered features (optional but recommended)

SMARTLING_MCP_TOKEN.description: Smartling MCP Server token for premium features (machine translation, translation memory, style guides)

SMARTLING_ACCOUNT_ID.description: Default Smartling Account ID (optional but recommended)

SMARTLING_USER_SECRET.description: Smartling User Secret for API authentication

SMARTLING_USER_IDENTIFIER.description: Smartling User Identifier for API authentication

tools.name: smartling_machine_translate_text
tools.description: Translate text content using machine translation. Split long text into sentence-based chunks to preserve meaning and context - avoid breaking mid-sentence or splitting related content.

source_locale.description: Source language locale code (2 or 5 letters, e.g., "it" or "it-IT", dash separator only). Auto-detected if omitted.

target_locale.description: Target language locale code (2 or 5 letters, e.g., "en" or "en-US", dash separator only)

key.description: Unique identifier for the text item

source_text.description: Text to be translated. If text is too long, split it into smaller chunks.

text_items_to_translate.description: Array of text items to translate

tools.name: smartling_machine_translate_file
tools.description: Translate file content using machine translation. Auto-detects source language if source_locale not provided.

file_content.description: File content encoded as base64 string

source_locale.description: Source language locale code (2 or 5 letters, e.g., "it" or "it-IT", dash separator only). Auto-detected if omitted.

target_locale.description: Target language locale code (2 or 5 letters, e.g., "en" or "en-US", dash separator only)

tools.name: smartling_search_translation_memory
tools.description: Search translation memory for similar translations in a Smartling project. Useful for finding existing translations that match or are similar to source text.

search.description: The source text to search for in translation memory

locale_id.description: The target locale identifier (e.g., "es-ES", "fr-FR") to search translations for

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the Smartling project to search translation memory within

minimum_score.description: Minimum similarity score threshold (0.0 to 1.0). Higher values return more exact matches. Defaults to 0.1

tools.name: smartling_list_style_guides
tools.description: List style guides from the current Smartling account. Style guides are collections of rules about content formatting, writing tone, and style to ensure consistent translations.

name.description: Name of the style guide to filter by. If not provided, all style guides will be listed.

tools.name: smartling_get_style_guide
tools.description: Get specific style guide by its unique identifier. Style guides contain rules about content formatting, writing tone, and style preferences.

style_guide_uid.description: Unique identifier of the style guide to retrieve

tools.name: smartling_list_linguistic_packages
tools.description: List all linguistic packages from the current Smartling account. Linguistic packages are collections of translation resources including glossaries and style guides.

tools.name: smartling_get_linguistic_package
tools.description: Get specific linguistic package by its unique identifier. Linguistic packages contain settings that determine which linguistic assets (glossaries, style guides) are provided to translators.

linguistic_package_uid.description: UID of the linguistic package to retrieve

tools.name: smartling_add_strings_to_job
tools.description: Add strings to an existing Smartling job by their hashcodes. Provides granular string-level control over job content.

job_uid.description: The unique identifier of the job to add strings to

hashcodes.description: Array of string hashcodes to add to the job

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the Smartling project

move_enabled.description: Whether to move strings from other jobs if they already exist elsewhere. Default is false

target_locale_ids.description: Array of target locale IDs to add strings for. If not provided, strings will be added for all job target locales

tools.name: smartling_remove_strings_from_job
tools.description: Remove strings from an existing Smartling job by their hashcodes. Useful for cleaning up job content before authorization.

job_uid.description: The unique identifier of the job to remove strings from

hashcodes.description: Array of string hashcodes to remove from the job

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the Smartling project

target_locale_ids.description: Array of target locale IDs to remove strings for. If not provided, strings will be removed for all job target locales

tools.name: smartling_list_projects_advanced
tools.description: List projects from the current Smartling account with advanced filtering. Supports filtering by name, project type, and archived status.

include_archived.description: Whether to include archived projects in the list. If not provided, only active projects will be listed.

project_type_codes.description: Array of project type codes to filter by. If not provided, all project types will be listed.

project_name_filter.description: Name of the project to filter by. If not provided, all projects will be listed.

tools.name: smartling_get_project_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific project by its UID. Includes comprehensive project configuration and metadata.

project_uid.description: The unique identifier of the Smartling project to retrieve details for

tools.name: smartling_match_glossary_terms
tools.description: Match terms within specific glossaries against source and translation text. Useful for finding specific terms in source and translated strings for quality assurance.

glossary_uids.description: Array of glossary UIDs to search within

source_locale_id.description: Source locale ID for the terms to match

key.description: Unique identifier for the text item

text.description: Source text to be matched. If the text is too long, then split it into smaller chunks.

source_text_to_match.description: Source text to match against glossary terms

translation_locale_id.description: Target locale ID for the terms to match

mt_optimized_terms_only.description: Whether to include only MT-optimized terms. If not specified then MT-optimized only terms will be included.

key.description: Unique identifier for the text item

text.description: Translated text to be matched. If you need to only find terms in source string then leave this empty but still pass the key.

translation_text_to_match.description: Translation text to match against glossary terms. For source-only matching, pass empty text but preserve keys
